name: Tall Bagel
description:
Sam, your uncle, has invited you, your mother, and the Sullivans to dinner at a fancy restaurant.

Relive the unparalleled joy of a fancy restaurant meal in this, the year of Covid.

Tall Bagel was created by Laura Michet and Brendon Chung for the 7 Day FPS Jam 2020.

  • Writing, Scripting, Audio, Design: Laura Michet
  • Code, Art, Design: Brendon Chung
  • Music: Choroplethora

Note: Tall Bagel is moddable! There's a readme.txt that explains how to change the game's art and scripting.
